mapper.insert:
insert into meta.mm_order_node ( id, order_code, node_code, node_name, node_todo_staff_id, node_todo_staff_name, node_start_time, node_status, node_do_staff_id, node_do_staff_name, node_end_time, node_opinions, create_date, modify_date, creator_id, modifier_id, remark, order_id ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.orderCode}, #{item.nodeCode}, #{item.nodeName}, #{item.nodeTodoStaffId}, #{item.nodeTodoStaffName}, #{item.nodeStartTime}, #{item.nodeStatus}, #{item.nodeDoStaffId}, #{item.nodeDoStaffName}, #{item.nodeEndTime}, #{item.nodeOpinions}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.modifyDate}, #{item.creatorId}, #{item.modifierId}, #{item.remark}, #{item.orderId} )
